titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Jean Rhees, 6. 7. [1949]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der ÖNB (Autogr. 1286/22-5); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Please forgive me for not thanking you for your letter. One reason was laziness, but there were other reasons, too. I've had lots of worries lately & wasn't feeling too well. ‒ I don't know whether or not I shall accept your kind offer to stay with you, for my moves in the near future are very uncertain, I'm afraid.
I should very much like to see you again.
